scripts.setup: lerna bootstrap && yarn run build && cd test/project && yarn install
scripts.lint: lerna run lint --parallel && eslint test/support && cd test/project && yarn run lint
scripts.test-project: cd test/project && yarn install && NODE_ENV=development yarn start
scripts.release: yarn run lint && yarn run cover && NODE_ENV=production yarn run build && lerna publish
scripts.test-project:build: NODE_ENV=production yarn run build && cd test/project && yarn install && NODE_ENV=production yarn build
scripts.test-project:deploy: yarn run test-project:build && rsync -ravzulO --chmod=u=rwX,g=rX --delete-after test/project/deploy/ test/tmp/ uiengine-sample-project.uix.space:virtual/uiengine-sample-project.uix.space
